body_html:
@kecsap I was able to build and make the example
However, I had to ran the command first because it could not the find the needed file.

sudo apt-get install libv4l-dev

Anyways, Thanks for your support.

One more thing, I was trying to run my test cpp file but every time I ran the command below to compile.

g++ -I/usr/include/tensorflow-cpp -L/usr/lib/tensorflow-cpp  tfCpp1.cpp

I get an error.

/usr/include/tensorflow-cpp/tensorflow/core/platform/default/mutex.h:25:22: fatal error: nsync_cv.h: No such file or directory
 #include "nsync_cv.h"

I believe I am missing something.

body:
@kecsap I was able to build and make the [example](https://github.com/kecsap/tensorflow_cpp_packaging/tree/master/rpi_examples)
However, I had to ran the command first because it could not the find the needed file. 
```
sudo apt-get install libv4l-dev
```
Anyways, Thanks for your support.

One more thing, I was trying to run my test cpp file but every time I ran the command below to compile.
```
g++ -I/usr/include/tensorflow-cpp -L/usr/lib/tensorflow-cpp  tfCpp1.cpp
```

I get an error.
```
/usr/include/tensorflow-cpp/tensorflow/core/platform/default/mutex.h:25:22: fatal error: nsync_cv.h: No such file or directory
 #include "nsync_cv.h"
```

I believe I am missing something.
